# Plot data

Image files saved as [PNG](../figures/clicksTotal.png), [SVG](../figures/clicksTotal.svg)

![clicksTotal.png](../figures/clicksTotal.png)

```{r, fig.show = "hide"}
f <- "rocPSCompare"
G <- 
  theme(legend.position = "bottom",
        plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))
ggsave(paste0("../figures/", f, ".png"), dpi = 300)
ggsave(paste0("../figures/", f, ".svg"), dpi = 300)
file.info(paste0("../figures/", grep(f, list.files("../figures/"), value = TRUE)))[c("size", "mtime")]
```
